generalInfo: Not recommended during pregnancy due to lack of sufficient data.
Contraindicated in active liver disease or unexplained persistent elevations of serum transaminases.
hepaticImpairment.specificInfo: Avoid use in patients with active hepatic disease or unexplained persistent liver enzyme elevations.

generalInfo: Contraindicated in pregnancy; may harm the foetus. Discontinue immediately if pregnancy is detected.
Dose adjustment may be required in moderate to severe renal impairment.

sideEffects.specificInfo: Common: Headache; nausea; diarrhoea; muscle pain; joint pain; Flatulence; constipation; Sleep disturbances; dizziness. Uncommon: Memory loss; pancreatitis; hepatitis. Rare: Myopathy; hearing loss. Frequency not known: depression; Rhabdomyolysis; Interstitial lung disease

dosages.doseInfo: 10 mg once daily, adjusted according to response
